channel.title: Help please server is almost done!
channel.description:
i have just a few more things to put on my server that i dont know how to do. can you help? I have pimpscape source.
here they are:
[ul][li]Change the def, range, etc. requirement. (like black d hide needs 60 def to wear)[/li] [li]Make the mage arena safezone.[/li] [li]Make a command ::starter, and can only use 1 time.[/li] [li]Make a commands ::menu, ::commands, and ::rules and then menus come up.[/li] [li]Fix ice barrage on NPC's.[/li][/ul]
plz help i just have 5 more things then im done with my server. :( thanks

item.title: Help please server is almost done!
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

i have been its just do you guys know some of this stuff on the top of your head?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 10:50:34 AM[/size][hr]o and forgot to add 2 things

[ul][li]Make pots eventually wear away.[/li]
[li]Make an altar give you prayer xp.[/li][/ul]
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 10:54:12 AM[/size][hr]plz help me!!!

Read full topic
